channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He even bragged about his Mercedes-Benz:’ I rejected two egotistical advisers. I managed my life savings and they tripled over 25 years. Did I do OK?
item.description: “We do not take out-of-country or five-star vacations. Instead, we enjoy time with family and friends and hobbies.”

item.title: ‘I have absolutely no idea what to do’: I was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and inherited $400K. How do I invest it?
Chevron stock soars 8%. What analysts are saying about big oil companies after Maduro’s capture
item.description: Chevron shares were among the big gainers on Monday as investors gauged the U.S. capture of Venezuela’s leader.

item.title: Here are the most popular Moneyist columns of 2025
item.description: Bad executors, greedy friends, inheritances, elder abuse and qualifying for Medicaid featured as the most-read Moneyist columns of the year.

item.title: How one trader quickly turned a $30,000 wager on Venezuela action into $400,000
item.description: A sudden flurry of bets were made on Nicolas Maduro not making it to the Jan. 31 as leader of Venezuela.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
